homePage.title: Learn quantum computing.
homePage.description: Quantum Camp is the place where you'll discover quantum computing, whether you're a computer engineer or simply curious.

homeCardsFullSection.title: Why should you learn quantum computing?
homeCardsFullSection.description: Quantum computing revolutionizes computation and opens unique technological opportunities. 🚀

about.text1: Welcome to QuantumCamp, your French-speaking platform dedicated to learning quantum computing! 🌌 At QuantumCamp, we firmly believe that quantum computation is not reserved for a scientific elite. Our mission is to demystify the complex concepts of this fascinating field and make them accessible to everyone. Whether you're a student, curious professional, or passionate about new technologies, QuantumCamp is designed to accompany you in this discovery.
about.text2: Quantum computing represents a major turning point in the technological world. However, the lack of educational content in French hinders access to this knowledge for a wide audience. QuantumCamp aims to fill this gap by offering educational resources in French, accessible and adapted to a broad public.

cgu.content1:
These Terms of Use (hereinafter "Terms") are intended to define the terms and conditions under which users (hereinafter "Users") can access and use the QuantumCamp site/app (hereinafter "the Service").

By accessing or using the Service, the User accepts these Terms without reservation.
cgu.content2:
Company name: Quantumcamp,
Registered office address: Paris,
Contact: contact@quantumcamp.fr
cgu.content3:
The Service is freely accessible to any User with Internet access. The User is responsible for their computer equipment, software and Internet access.

Certain features may require registration or authentication. The User undertakes to provide accurate information during registration.
cgu.content4:
To access certain features, the User must create a personal account by providing accurate and up-to-date information.

User obligations:
- Not to share their credentials with a third party.
- Maintain the confidentiality of their login information.
- Immediately inform Quantumcamp in case of suspected fraudulent use of their account.
Quantumcamp reserves the right to suspend or delete an account in case of violation of the Terms.
cgu.content5:
All content present on the Service (texts, images, logos, videos, etc.) is protected by intellectual property laws and is the exclusive property of Quantumcamp or its partners.

The User undertakes not to reproduce, modify, distribute or exploit this content without express authorization.
cgu.content6:
The User undertakes not to:

- Use the Service for illegal or fraudulent purposes.
- Transmit offensive, defamatory or illicit content.
- Harm the proper functioning of the Service, particularly by introducing viruses or other malicious technologies.
cgu.content7: The processing of the User's personal data is governed by our privacy policy. By using Quantumcamp, the User consents to the processing of their data in accordance with this policy.
cgu.content8:
Quantumcamp strives to ensure the proper functioning and security of the Service. However, Quantumcamp cannot be held responsible in case of:

- Temporary interruptions for maintenance or updates.
- Direct or indirect damages related to the use or inability to use the Service.
cgu.content9:
Quantumcamp reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Modifications will be published on this page and will take effect upon publication.

The User is invited to regularly consult the Terms. By continuing to use the Service, the User accepts the modifications.
cgu.content10: These Terms are governed by French law. In case of dispute, the competent courts are those of the Ile-de-France jurisdiction.
cgu.content11:
For any question or complaint relating to these Terms, the User can contact:

- Email: contact@quantumcamp.fr

privacyPolicy.introduction: At QuantumCamp, we attach great importance to protecting the personal data of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information in accordance with applicable laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). By using our services, you accept the terms of this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.content1:
The data controller is:
- Company name: QuantumCamp
- Address: Paris
- Email: contact@quantumcamp.com
privacyPolicy.content2: We only collect data necessary to provide and improve our services. The types of data collected include: First name, Email address, Login information (username and password), Any other information voluntarily provided via our forms or communications.
privacyPolicy.content3: User account creation and management, personalization of your experience on our platform, sending communications related to our services, such as updates or notifications, improvement of our services through statistical analysis, compliance with legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.content4: Consent: When you have explicitly accepted the processing (e.g.: newsletter subscription), contract execution: When processing is necessary to provide you with a service, legal obligation: When the law requires us to retain certain data, legitimate interest: To improve our services and ensure their security.
privacyPolicy.content5:
Your personal data is never sold. However, it may be shared with the following third parties, only when necessary:

- Service providers: Technical providers (hosting, emails, payments).
- Legal authorities: If required by law or in case of judicial request.

All our partners commit to respecting strict confidentiality standards.
privacyPolicy.content6:
Your data is retained only for the time necessary for the purposes described in this Policy. Retention periods may vary:

- Account data: Until user account deletion.
- Navigation data: 12 months maximum.
- Data related to legal obligations: Periods imposed by legislation.
privacyPolicy.content7:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss or alteration:

- Use of secure protocols (HTTPS).
- Password encryption.
- Regular security checks.

However, no system is completely invulnerable, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacyPolicy.content8: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights: Right of access: Obtain a copy of personal data concerning you. Right of rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information. Right to erasure: Request deletion of your personal data. Right to limitation: Restrict the processing of your data in certain cases. Right to portability: Receive your data in a structured and readable format. Right to object: Refuse the processing of your data for legitimate reasons. Right to withdraw your consent: At any time, for processing based on your consent.
privacyPolicy.content9:
Our site uses cookies to improve your experience. Cookies may be used to:

- Store your user preferences.
- Track your navigation for analysis purposes.

You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.content10:
This Privacy Policy may be updated to reflect changes in our practices or regulations. We will inform you of any significant changes by email or via our site.

Last update date: 29/11/2024
privacyPolicy.content11:
For any question or complaint regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact us:

- By email: contact@quantumcamp.com
